titleStmt.title: Strange newes of a prodigious monster borne in the towneship of Allington in the parish of Standish in the Countie of Lancaster, the 17. day of Aprill last, 1613. Testified by the reuerend diuine Mr. W. Leigh, Bachelor of Diuinitie, and preacher of Gods word at Standish aforesaid.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. P[indley] for S. M[an] and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Ball,

notesStmt.note: Printer's and bookseller's names from STC.
Leigh is only cited as a witness by an anonymous narrator--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Ball
